_id.description: must be an ObjectId and is required

competition.description: must be an ObjectId and is required

player.description: must be an ObjectId and is required

score.description: must be an integer and is optional

reported.description: must be a boolean and defaults to false

status.description: can be 'scheduled', 'reported', or 'confirmed' and defaults to 'scheduled'

date.description: must be a date and is required
